mapper.insert: insert into game_suit_equip (suitid, equipid) values (#{suitid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipid, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert all
into game_suit_equip (suitid, equipid) values (#{item.suitid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.equipid, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select 1 from dual
mapper.delete: delete from game_suit_equip where 1=1 and suitid = #{0} and equipid = #{1}
